outline:
1. bone, essence, substance
    1. bone
      1. body, limbs, members, external body
    2. bone (of animal)
    3. substance, self
kjv_def: body, bone, [idiom] life, (self-) same, strength, [idiom] very.
strongs_def: a bone (as strong); by extension, the body; figuratively, the substance, i.e. (as pron.) selfsame
